review: Family walked in while I was dismembering a dead archer with my balls in a knight's mouth.10/10
Put on a clown mask then found a fresh spawn and handcuffed him. Force fed him disinfectant spray if he stopped singing Katy Perry's Dark Horse. 11/10
Great realistic war game, a lot of mods and of course Czech army dlc :-D
my steam number one game almost over 600 hours of gameplay ....amazing game :)
